alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 24 at 8:27AM CST until December 25 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River At Dallas affecting Dallas County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River at Dallas. * WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 32.0 feet, Minor flooding of agricultural lands used for cattle grazing will occur. Low water crossings near the river will begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CST Sunday the stage was 25.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 30.0 feet. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 32.2 feet late this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
